title: Honey and grapefruit polenta cake
description: All the sweetness in this cake comes from honey and a maple cream topping, balanced beautifully by candied grapefruit and blood orange.Equipment and preparation: you will need a deep 20cm/8in round tin and a kitchen thermometer for this recipe.
ingredients: 200g/7oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing tins
1 large red grapefruit, finely grated zest only
